author: m.kalinin
content:
Good question. We have a PR that changes Message ordering section and there is a discussion thread with near the same question, https://github.com/ethereum/execution-apis/pull/133#discussion_r756365294. Please, chime in.

Persisting `id` looks brittle to me. We rather reset an `id` either by negotiating (if we ever have sessions) or by sending a specific value e.g. `id == 0`

author: ajsutton
content: Teku+Geth just sync'd devnet-1.  ðŸŽ‰   Turns out I probably could have done that days ago - there *is* a bad block that geth will reject on the PoW chain it's just after the merge block (or possibly an alternate merge block). So ignore the big scary warning geth prints, start the beacon node and off we go.
